subject: Riddle me this!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
If EVP is just our minds trying to make sense out of chaotic noise, then
why I hear no voices in this? Yeah, that was "my shelter" aka my work room
last night.

 Frank-S

I EVP is jus ou minds ying o make sense ou o chao ic noise, hen why I hea no oices in his? Yeah, ha was "my shel e " aka my wo k oom las nigh . 
 
 F ank-S
